title: Children with diarrheal disease vs. oral rehydration salts
subtitle: The share of children under five years old experiencing [diarrheal diseases](#dod:diarrheal-diseases) in the past year, versus the percentage of children under age five with diarrhea, in the two weeks preceding the survey, who received [oral rehydration salts](#dod:oral-rehydration-salts).

display.name: Share of children with diarrheal disease
Share of children with diarrhea who received oral rehydration salts
display.unit: % of children under 5 who received ORS packet
